**Majlis Citra Karisma 2025**  
Tempoh permohonan 12 Mac – 30 April 2025  
Hantar permohonan kepada **utmicorporateservices@utm.my**

[Click Here](http://utmicorporateservices@utm.my/)

![](https://international.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Snapinsta.app_447770430_1496515920939314_1474876988433865943_n_1080.jpg)

**Congratulations UTM**

for being ranked

**#181** in the **[QS World University Rankings](https://www.facebook.com/universityrankings/?__tn__=kK*F)
 2025**

![](https://international.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Snapinsta.app_448356738_825580769041349_1731317987586969227_n_1024.jpg)

**Congratulations UTM!**  
We moved up and now  
**ranked #164 in the 2024 Times Higher Education.**  
Well done all staffs and students!

![](https://international.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/286757148_10158396952946927_4056476115258102094_n.jpg)

**[Congratulations](https://www.newbalancejobs.com/betting-site/)
 Universiti Teknologi Malaysia!**

is among the Top 15%  
in the QS World University Rankings 2023 with 6 Top 100 Subjects.

![](https://international.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/WhatsApp-Image-2021-11-30-at-9.36.38-AM.jpeg)

**Congratulations! UTM ranks #39 in Engineering field by  
the [U.S. News and World Report](https://www.facebook.com/usnewsandworldreport/?__tn__=kK*F)
 Best Global University Ranking**

![](https://international.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/WhatsApp-Image-2021-11-30-at-9.35.54-AM.jpeg)

**Congratulations UTM!**  
**We moved up and now ranked in the 2022 Times Higher Education THE Worlds University Ranking by Subject in Computer Science. Well done all staf and students!**
